@roblox/global/Input.getKey.documentation: Returns true if this key is currently held down.

@roblox/global/Input.getKeyDown.documentation: Returns true if this key was pressed this frame.

@roblox/global/Input.getKeyUp.documentation: Returns true if this key was released this frame.

@roblox/global/Input.getAnalog.documentation: Returns the value of the analog input for the given axis.

@roblox/global/Input.getMouseDelta.documentation: Returns the position delta of the mouse since the last frame.
